Html:
Hi

How I can create ciation for more than one author in the text

e.g.

(Collins, 1998; Brown, 2001; Davies, 2008)

 

Thanks

That would be up to the style you are using, but normally yes.

See http://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=FAQ&referringTitle=Styles_FAQ#Q1

Also check http://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=FAQ&referringTitle=Styles_FAQ#Q2
Sorted. Thanks and much appreciate your help yves.
